entry.tran: 迷人的;动人的；有魅力的
entry.def: If you describe a person or their actions or behaviour as winsome, you mean that they are attractive and charming.

example.ex: She gave him her best winsome smile.
example.tran: 她给了他一个最为迷人的微笑。

means.word_mean: 1. charming in a childlike or naive way

auth_sentence.content: Rarely has such winsome music been forged from such rough materials.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rarely has such winsome music been forged from such rough materials.

auth_sentence.content: Scarlett Johansson is somewhat miscast as the winsome head keeper, Kelly.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,"充满……的,具有……倾向"

stems_affixes.word_buile: frolic嬉戏的,欢乐的+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.快活的,欢乐的
loath不情愿的,勉强的+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.可憎的,令人作呕的
lone孤独的,独立的+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.寂寞的
meddle管闲事+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.爱管闲事的
mettle勇气+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.精神抖擞的
noi臭+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.恶臭的,令人不快的
quarrel吵架+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.喜欢吵架的,好争论的
win赢得+some充满……的,具有……倾向→adj.媚人的,漂亮的
